org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler

Class TransferActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.ConnectionActions
      • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.ServerActions
        • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.TransferActions

  • public class TransferActions
extends ServerActions
    Class to implement actions related to real transfer: request initialization, data transfer, end of transfer and of request, changing filename or filesize.
